Leo Cabibihan

Suffers from an overdose of JavaScript

About Me

Leo is the type of person who you would find reading a book rather than socializing. Since he was young he always spent time in his room taking things apart and putting them back together with Lego. Now that Lego is really expensive, you can find him making web projects with JavaScript here.

Fortunately for him, he has also developed healthy interests in marketing, design, and football (the one with your feet). When he is not doing any of the above he is probably eating or at school.
